table.name: location
table.description: A Location is a place where transportation related activities occur, such as loading and unloading freight. In addition, a location may represent a corporation, and/or a service provider.

columns.name: LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the location.

columns.name: LOCATION_XID
columns.description: The XID for the location.

columns.name: LOCATION_NAME
columns.description: The name of the location.

columns.name: CITY
columns.description: The name of the city for the location.

columns.name: PROVINCE
columns.description: The province (or U.S. state) for the location.

columns.name: PROVINCE_CODE
columns.description: The abbreviation for the province (or U.S. state) for the location.

columns.name: POSTAL_CODE
columns.description: The postal code for the location.

columns.name: COUNTRY_CODE3_GID
columns.description: A GID to define the three digit country code.

columns.name: ZONE1
columns.description: The zone where the location fits in.

columns.name: ZONE2
columns.description: The zone where the location fits in.

columns.name: ZONE3
columns.description: The zone where the location fits in.

columns.name: ZONE4
columns.description: The zone where the location fits in.

columns.name: TIME_ZONE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the time zone of the location. Examples of time zones include America/Curacao and Europe/Monaco.

columns.name: LAT
columns.description: The latitude for the location.

columns.name: LON
columns.description: The longitude of the location.

columns.name: SOURCING_GROUP_NAME
columns.description: Another way of grouping the locations.

columns.name: DELIVERY_GROUP_NAME
columns.description: Another way of grouping the locations.

columns.name: REGION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the region.

columns.name: SERVPROV_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the service provider for the location.

columns.name: LOCATION_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The GID for the location group for the location.

columns.name: IS_TEMPORARY
columns.description: A flag to identify if the location is created temporarily for a certain shipment or order. This location will not be used for other shipments or processes.

columns.name: IS_MAKE_APPT_BEFORE_PLAN
columns.description: A true or false flag to identify if an appointment is required at the location for (example) for pickup, delivery etc.

columns.name: IS_SHIPPER_KNOWN
columns.description: The Known Shipper check box indicates if a shipper is known or unknown. Shippers are considered unknown if they have not filed the appropriate paperwork and gained permission to ship goods on passenger flights. Goods transported by these shippers must be placed on cargo flights. Select Known Shipper if orders coming from this location can be qualified as known, and therefore transported on passenger flights.

columns.name: IS_ADDRESS_VALID
columns.description: Indicates if the address is considered valid (by checking against the POSTAL_CODE_VALIDATE table).

columns.name: RATE_CLASSIFICATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the rate classification. Examples include: COMMERCIAL and RESIDENTIAL.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GROUP_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the equipment group profile. An Equipment Group Profile is used to categorize Equipment groups by some common attribute or grouping scheme. For example, you can create a Group Profile called Dry Vans that include the 28 FT Dry Van and 24 FT Dry Van (and others if you like) Equipment Groups. An Equipment Group Profile consists of an ID and a Profile Name and a collection of specific Equipment Groups that you associate with the profile. Oracle Transportation Management can use the Profile in planning to limit the Equipment Groups that can be used for shipment planning. When Oracle Transportation Management bundles orders and builds shipments, it checks that there is an intersection between the equipment group values identified on the order bases. Example: Equipment Group Rule

columns.name: SLOT_TIME_INTERVAL
columns.description: The smallest appointment slot interval for the location.

columns.name: SLOT_TIME_INTERVAL_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the location appointment slot time interval.

columns.name: SLOT_TIME_INTERVAL_BASE
columns.description: The location appointment slot time interval in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: IS_LTL_SPLITABLE
columns.description: The LTL Splittable check box indicates whether orders from or to this location are permitted to apply the LTL splitting logic. If the check box is not selected, the LTL splitting is disallowed for orders associated with this location.

columns.name: NUM_OF_ROWS_IN_YARD
columns.description: The total number of rows in the yard of the location.

columns.name: NUM_OF_SLOTS_PER_ROW_IN_YARD
columns.description: The number of slots per row in the yard of the location.

columns.name: USE_APPOINTMENT_PRIORITY
columns.description: Whether or not to consider appointment priority.

columns.name: SCHEDULE_LOW_PRIORITY_APPOINT
columns.description: Whether or not to schedule appointment for low priority appointment that has been bumped off.

columns.name: ENFORCE_TIME_WINDOW_APPOINT
columns.description: Whether or not to enforce the pick up or delivery time window during appointment schedule process.'USE_APPOINTMENT_PRIORITY' takes precedence of 'ENFORCE_TIME_WINDOW_APPOINT'.

columns.name: SCHEDULE_INFEASIBLE_APPOINT
columns.description: Whether or not to schedule appointment if the appointment time available is out of pick up or delivery time window.

columns.name: COUNTY_QUALIFIER
columns.description: County Qualifier is used when calling an external distance engine and using an address type of city instead of postal code. Often, there are two cities or towns with the same name in one state. For example, in Pennsylvania there is more than one town with the name 'Newtown'. If you do not combine the town with a postal code or a county, you may not get the result you want. You can manually add values; however, you probably want to import them from the external distance engine that you are using. The county qualifier needs to correspond with the distance engine that you are using.

columns.name: BB_MAX_CASES_PER_BATCH
columns.description: Maximum number of cases allowed in each batch.  If blank, the system will assume that there is no limit.  If the number of cases in the order exceeds this maximum, then the batch balancer's splitting logic will distribute the cases into multiple batches uniformly while honoring certain rules.

columns.name: BB_IS_NEW_STORE
columns.description: Indicates if this location should be treated as a new store by the Batch Balancer logic.  New stores can only be assigned by Batch Balancer to a DOOR whose LOAD_NEW_STORE field is set to Y.

columns.name: BB_ORDER_SPLIT_METHOD
columns.description: Value of 'CONVEYABLE' causes only conveyable cases to be counted toward max cases, value of 'ALL' causes all cases (including non-con and repack) to count toward max cases.

columns.name: EXCLUDE_FROM_ROUTE_EXECUTION
columns.description: When = Y, this location is excluded from any Route Instance Legs.

columns.name: APPOINT_DISPLAY
columns.description: The duration of appointment display time period.

columns.name: APPOINT_DISPLAY_BASE
columns.description: Unit of measure for ACTIVITY_TIME column. Unit of measure for ACTIVITY_TIME column. The unit of measure of appoint_display column.

columns.name: APPOINT_DISPLAY_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The appointment duration in base units.

columns.name: APPOINT_DISPLAY_START_TIME
columns.description: The start time of appointment view display.

columns.name: PICKUP_ROUTING_SEQUENCE_GID
columns.description: Pickup Routing Sequence and Dropoff Routing Sequence control the routing sequence; how the system plans the sequence of shipment stops that are built from an order.

columns.name: DROPOFF_ROUTING_SEQUENCE_GID
columns.description: Pickup Routing Sequence and Dropoff Routing Sequence control the routing sequence; how the system plans the sequence of shipment stops that are built from an order.

columns.name: POSTAL_SPLC_GID
columns.description: The Postal Standard Point Location Code for this Location.

columns.name: RAIL_SPLC_GID
columns.description: The Rail Standard Point Location Code for this Location.

columns.name: RAIL_STATION_CODE_GID
columns.description: The Rail Station Code for this Location.

columns.name: ERPC_GID
columns.description: The Eastern Region Presidents Commission Code for this Location.

columns.name: RAIL_JUNCTION_CODE_GID
columns.description: The Rail Junction Code for this Location.

columns.name: SERVING_SERVPROV_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The Serving Service Provider Profile for this Location.

columns.name: YARD_ROW_LABELS
columns.description: Comma separated list of labels for rows in a yard.

columns.name: YARD_SLOT_LABELS
columns.description: Comma separated list of labels for slots in a yard.

columns.name: IS_TEMPLATE
columns.description: Identifies if the location record is a template or represents a physical location.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Free text to capture different location types or classifications like customer, vendor site, or stores etc.

columns.name: STANDING_APPT_CUTOFF_WINDOW
columns.description: The cutoff window by which unbooked standing appointments to be released.

columns.name: ALLOW_DRIVER_REST
columns.description: Indicates if a driver is allowed to take a rest period at this location if he runs out of available HOS.

columns.name: APPT_OBJECT_TYPE
columns.description: Indicates the types of appointment objects this location handles.  Shipments, Shipment Groups or both Shipments and Shipment Groups.

columns.name: APPT_SEARCH_DAYS
columns.description: Use the Appointment Search Days field to override the value of the glog.appointment.searchDays property for this location. Set this field to control the number of days to look forward for the first feasible appointment.

columns.name: APPT_SHOW_NUMBER_OF_OPTIONS
columns.description: Use the Appointment Show Number Of Options field to override the value of the glog.appointment.scheduleAppointmentShowOptions.numberOfAppointments property for this location. Set this field to control how many appointments are displayed when running the Schedule Appointment - Show Options action on the Appointment Management page.

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_ACTIVITY_TYPE
columns.description: Appointment activity type refers to whether the appointment if for a drop trailer or live unload scenario.

columns.name: IS_FIXED_ADDRESS
columns.description: Y/N if address is only allowed to be edited by the UI.

columns.name: PRIMARY_ADDRESS_LINE_SEQ
columns.description: The Address Line Number or primary address line sequence number designates which line of the address text box contains the actual street address so when using the External Distance Engine, the correct street address is used.  For example, if you had this address in the text box, the line number would be 2. Care of Someone 1234 Main St.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: IS_ACTIVE
columns.description: Used to activate or deactivate location. When the value is 'N', it can restrain user from planning order to or from the inactive location; from tendering shipment with inactive location.

columns.name: ADDRESS_UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date on which the details -CITY,COUNTRY,PROVINCE,PROVINCE_CODE,POSTAL_CODE are modified.RPLS checks this date before it starts screening.

columns.name: SRC_ARB_LEVEL_OF_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: Preferred source arbitrary level of service when selecting the source arbitrary for a location during bulkplan.

columns.name: DEST_ARB_LEVEL_OF_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: Preferred destination arbitrary level of service when selecting the destination arbitrary for a location during bulkplan.

columns.name: USE_SINGLE_SERVPROV_RULE
columns.description: This specifies the use of single service provider rule at a location. The options are: null - rule is not used, P - for pickups only, D - for deliveries only, B - for both pickups and deliveries.

columns.name: SHUTTLE_LOT_EQ_GRP_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: This specifies the equipment group profile for the shuttle or parking lot of a location. When a shipment uses one of the equipment groups in this equipment group profile, the location cannot be directly accessed for pickup/delivery and is accessed only through the shuttle lot. In this case, additional shuttle lot activity time is computed and added to the activity time at the location.

columns.name: IS_WMS_FACILITY
columns.description: Indicates if the location is a warehouse management system facility.

columns.name: ERU_GROUPING
columns.description: To indicate orders going to this location will be grouped together for ERU grouping.

columns.name: APPT_ENFORCE_ACT_TIME_SG
columns.description: Enforce Activity Time for shipment group appointments.

columns.name: ADDRESS_VALIDATION_EDE
columns.description: Indicates which external distance engine is used to validate the location.

columns.name: OVERALL_QUALITY
columns.description: Indicates the overall quality of the location.

columns.name: HAS_MULTIPLE_MATCHES
columns.description: Indicates if we have multiple matches for the location after address validation.

columns.name: APPT_CUTOFF_HOURS
columns.description: Service provider appointment cutoff in hours.

columns.name: APPT_BEFORE_CUTOFF
columns.description: Service provider appointment duration before cutoff.

columns.name: APPT_BEFORE_CUTOFF_BASE
columns.description: The service provider appointment duration before cutoff in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: APPT_BEFORE_CUTOFF_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of meassure for the service provider appointment duration before cutoff.

columns.name: APPT_AFTER_CUTOFF
columns.description: Service provider appointment duration after cutoff.

columns.name: APPT_AFTER_CUTOFF_BASE
columns.description: The service provider appointment duration after cutoff in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: APPT_AFTER_CUTOFF_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of meassure for the service provider appointment duration after cutoff.

columns.name: APPT_START_TIME_TOLERANCE_SECS
columns.description: Stores tolerance value for appointment start time in seconds.
